articles.description: American Danielle Collins thanks the fans that heckled her during her second-round victory over Destanee Aiava at the Australian Open  for "paying my bills".
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Danielle Collins thanks fans for "paying my bills" after she was heckled in second-round win

articles.description: Kick It Out (KIO) asks Fifa if it has taken any action over a video posted on social media by Chelsea's Enzo Fernandez last year featuring an alleged "racist and transphobic" chant.
articles.title: Enzo Fernandez: Kick It Out ask questions of Fifa over alleged racist video

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Europe's six top goalscorers this season - including two Barcelona forwards.
articles.title: Robert Lewandowski, Harry Kane, Erling Haaland, Mohamed Salah, Omar Marmoush, Raphinha banging in the goals

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Myles Lewis-Skelly, the academy graduate who told Ian Wright he "feels a million dollars" playing for Arsenal.
articles.title: Myles Lewis-Skelly: Arsenal academy star lighting up Emirates

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she apologised to fellow Briton Andy Murray over her Wimbledon mixed doubles withdrawal last year as she did not want any "bad blood" between the pair.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu apologised to Andy Murray to avoid 'bad blood'

articles.description: The Los Angeles Clippers thrash the Brooklyn Nets 126-67 to set a new record for their largest margin of victory.
articles.title: NBA: Los Angeles Clippers set record in win over Brooklyn Nets

articles.description: Jannik Sinner recovers from a slow start against world number 173 Tristan Schoolkate to reach the third round and continue his Australian Open title defence.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jannik Sinner fights back to reach third round and continue title defence

articles.description: Five Indian sportswomen have been nominated for this year's BBC Indian Sportswoman of the Year award. Now the public can have their say in who will lift the prestigious award on 17 February.
articles.title: Who are the nominees for BBC Indian Sportswoman of the Year?

articles.description: Defending champion Rory McIlroy is five off the pace on day one of the Dubai Desert Classic after "scrambling" his way to an two-under-par 70.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Holder five behind after opening 70 at Dubai Desert Classic

articles.description: In a new BBC documentary, key figures associated with Real Madrid discuss why the club is so successful in the Champions League.
articles.title: How to win the Champions League: Real Madrid
